name: House Busters
description:
House busters! You've been trapped inside a giant house, and your goal is to escape.

Shoot down enemies, Find other character to team up with to help in your adventure!

Be careful though, you all share the same health! And your shots can also push each other into enemies.

Can you escape the house?

- Made for the 2021 GMTK Game jam -

Controls:

WSAD to move

Left click to shoot

Esc to exit

 -Credits-

Music done by: https://stealthypony.newgrounds.com/
